PHRASE.LANG: It has rounded golden neck hairs and pink cotton candy body with a snake tail. It acts agilely and hides by day and comes out at night. It often appears in the volcanic area full of rocks and lava.

It has rounded golden neck hairs and pink cotton candy body with a snake tail. It acts agilely and hides by day and comes out at night. It often appears in the volcanic area full of rocks and lava. [#Legal]

Chimera est un monstre qui a un corps rond avec cheveux d'or, comme un barbe à papa en rose, encore a une queue de serpent. Il est agile et nocturne, qui apparaît souvent dans le gravier est la lave du volcan. [#Legal]

Diese Monster ist flink und nächtlich. Sie hat goldene mollige Mähne, ein Körper wie rosa Zuckerwatte und einen Schwanz der Schlange, oft tauchen sie in vulkanischen Gebieten auf, wo mit Kies und Lava bedeckt ist. [#Legal]

Ricoperto da peli dorati, il corpo della Chimera è fatto di zucchero filato color rosa, è un mostro notturno svelto nei movimenti, spesso avvistato in zone vulcaniche melmose e piene di sassi. [#Legal]
Melena dorada redonda, el cuerpo rosado forma del alcodón de azúcar, y la cola del serpiente, es un monstro nocturno ágil. Se aparece en la zona volcánica lleno de piedras y lavas. [#Legal]
둥글둥글한 금색 모발, 분홍 솜사탕과 같은 몸과 뱀 꼬리를 갖은 날렵하고 밤에만 나타나는몬스터 입니다. 자갈 더미와 용암의 화산 지역에 출몰 자주 나타납니다. [#Legal]

It has rounded golden neck hairs and pink cotton candy body with a snake tail. It acts agilely and hides by day and comes out at night. It often appears in the volcanic area full of rocks and lava. [#Legal]
圓滾滾的金色鬃毛，粉紅色棉花糖的身體，還有條蛇尾巴，是行動敏捷、晝伏夜出的魔物，常出沒在滿布石礫及熔岩的火山地區。 [#Legal]
